original: PETTERSSON, Bror Stefanus, Direktör, Karlstad, f Kungsåra, Västml l, 3/8 83 av lantbrukare W P o Maria Åhlén, gm Gunhild Olsson. Stud v V.ås tekn sk o Bröd Påhlmans hdlsinst Sthlm; 7 års red-, skeppsmäkl-, bk- 0 sped.prakt Engl o Tyskl. Anst ag.fma Hj Söderström Sthlm 02, skpsmklfma Rud Landqvist Sthlm 03—06, skpsmklfma Geo Latus & Co Ltd Hull Engl 06—08, red- o skpsmklfma F G Reinhold Danzig 08—10, bk- o sped.-fma American Express Comp m b H Bremen Tyskl 10—13, O F Ahlmark & Co eftr AB Krist (red, skpsmkl, sped, kolimp o ass, grund 1847, AB 17) sed. 14, vkst dir där 21. Styr.led sistn AB, Värml red.AB, Werml ensk bk AB, Krist stuv.AB, Riksfrn f svenskh bev 1 utl, Stift f hem o läsrum f sjöm; ordf i dir f Sjöm.h (samtl i Karlst). RVOlkl.
translated: PETTERSSON, Bror Stefanus, Director, Karlstad, b. Kungsåra, Västmanland county, 3/8 83, son of farmer W P and Maria Åhlén, m. Gunhild Olsson. Studied at Västerås Technical School and Bröd Påhlmans Commercial Institute in Stockholm; has 7 years of experience in editing, ship brokering, banking, and forwarding in English and German. Employed by Hj Söderström in Stockholm from 1902, ship brokering firm Rud Landqvist in Stockholm from 1903-1906, ship brokering firm Geo Latus & Co Ltd in Hull, England from 1906-1908, editing and ship brokering firm F G Reinhold in Danzig from 1908-1910, banking and forwarding firm American Express Comp m b H in Bremen, Germany from 1910-1913. Employed by O F Ahlmark & Co eftr AB in Kristinehamn (editor, ship broker, forwarder, coal importer, and agent, established in 1847, joint stock company since 1917) since 1914, promoted to managerial director in 1921. Currently serves on the board of AB, Värmland, Wermlands Enskilda Bank AB, Kristinehamn Steamship AB, National Association for the Promotion of Swedish Interests Abroad, Foundation for Seamen's Homes and Reading Rooms; chairman of the board of Karlstad Maritime Association. Awarded Royal Order of Vasa, Knight Class.
